tool_description: Empower your applications with Hashtagy API –  Quick and easy hashtag generation for social media devs.
name: Hashtagy - Generate Hashtags
title: Hashtagy - Generate Hashtags

api_list.name: Get Banned Tags
api_list.description:
Detect Banned Hashtags

Identify and flag hashtags reported or flagged by the community for various reasons. Use this endpoint to ensure content compliance and maintain a clean and respectful online presence.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hashtagy-generate-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/v1/banned_tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashtagy-generate-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hashtagy-generate-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/v1/banned_tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashtagy-generate-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Related Hashtags
api_list.description:
Retrieve Relevant Social Media Hashtags

Access a wealth of related hashtags from prominent social media websites with this endpoint. Enhance your content strategy by seamlessly integrating dynamically generated and contextually relevant hashtags into your applications.

optional_parameters.name: include_tags_info
optional_parameters.description: If set to *true*, the API will provide statistical data for each hashtag. Note that enabling this option may result in longer processing times.

api_list.name: Get Related Hashtags (Custom)
api_list.description: Get related hashtags based on custom algorithms

api_list.name: Get Comprehensive Hashtags
api_list.description: Get a comprehensive list of hashtags based on your keyword

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Type of results (top,random,live). Defaults to: top
